no.wsact.mikand.pg4100.assignment2.views

Class ClientGreeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.wsact.mikand.pg4100.assignment2.views.Application
      • no.wsact.mikand.pg4100.assignment2.views.ClientGreeter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientGreeter
extends Application
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class greets the client and asks if he wants to quiz. The reason i made an independent greeter was to make the application as a whole more expandable. You could easily expand this solution with some other application and route there instead of the quiz based on user interaction.
    Version:
    14.03.15
    Author:
    Anders Mikkelsen
